lead_paragraph: American billionaire Donald Trump and a cast of other greedy characters want to turn some of the earth's most precious places into golf courses and playgrounds for the super rich. From the historic site of Dubrovnik to the ancient sand dunes and rolling green hills of the seaside town of Balmedie, these tycoons bully local residents, influence governments, ignore local referendums and even meddle in national environmental policies to acquire their latest trophies. Through in-depth interviews, we learn just how devastating these golf courses can be to the surrounding countryside and water tables. While the locals do not give in easily, it is unsure whether or not their fight be enough to protect their land and traditional way of life.
